title: Swap $$x$$ and $$y$$
text: Replace f(x) with $$y$$ and swap $$x$$ and $$y$$ in the equation.

title: Isolate the cubic term
text: Subtract $$5$$ from both sides to get $$y^3$$ by itself.

title: Solve for $$y$$
text: What operation undoes cubing? For squared terms, we use a square root to undo a square.
